facts.merged_content: 110 new models entered the market since 2020.
facts.narrative: Since 2020, the electric vehicle market has seen a surge with 110 new models entering the scene, reflecting the industry's rapid growth and innovation.

facts.merged_content: The BMW iX scored 790 out of 1,000, making it 2025’s most satisfying EV to own according to the survey.
facts.narrative: Among these new entrants, the BMW iX stands out, scoring 790 out of 1,000 in a survey, earning the title of 2025's most satisfying EV to own.
The BMW iX not only excels in satisfaction but also offers practicality with a generous boot capacity of 854 liters.
Battery capacities vary across the new models, offering consumers a range of options to suit their driving needs.

facts.merged_content: Range and charging capabilities of different models.

facts.merged_content: Tesla's market share decreased from 60% in 2020 to 38% in 2024.
